column4: does anyone here know how to mount an exisiting raid0 array into ubuntu??
you need to give way more details

your disk is toast or someone deleted stuff from under apt
and please please please tell me you're not being silly and using Debian package sources
should i uninstall or remove those packages i just installed??
I have no idea what you've done
yeah, but it should be automatically
ask on the ndiswrapper mailing list, and include the output of lspci
no idea, i was just wanting to get a simple web server up to host some pics
apache2 will be much less hassle
